lines: Aaron walks into Pinnacle.  Marble, glass, brightly lit atrium.  It’s gorgeous.  A row of clocks LOS ANGELES NEW YORK  LONDON  MOSCOW  TOKYO line the wall.
Well, Andrea, I’m Aaron Greenberg, your future intern.
How adorable.  Interns don’t meet with the head of the company.
The Receptionist looks on her computer.
And you have been assigned to classical.  Three floors down.  Enjoy.
Aaron smiles at her with all his might.  She can’t believe he’s lying.
Yeah.  But it was a while ago.
Sergio’s in his office.  The Receptionist walks in.
It’s Aldous Snow on line two.
Aldous Snow?  If this is one of those pranks shows I will destroy you.
No.  It’s not.  It’s really him.
